testsuite.name: br.edu.unifalmg.repository.FileChoreRepositoryTest

testcase.name: #save > When saving a null file > Should return false
#save > When saving an invalid file > Should return false
#save > When saving a file with a null chore > Should return false
#load > When the file is found > When the content is empty > Return empty list
#load > When the file is not found (or path is invalid) > Return an empty list
#save > When saving a valid file > Should return true
#save > When saving an empty file > Should return false
#load > When the file is loaded > Return a chores' list

testsuite.system-out: ERROR: Unable to write the chores on the file. ERROR: Unable to write the chores on the file. ERROR: Unable to write the chores on the file. Unable to convert the content of the file into Chores! ERROR: Unable to open file. ERROR: Unable to write the chores on the file.
